problem: 如图,在以O为圆心的两个同心圆中,大圆的弦AB与小圆相切于点C,若大圆的半径为5cm,小圆的半径为3cm,则弦AB的长为()
answer: 解:连接OA,OC,∵AB与小圆相切,∴OC⊥AB,∴C为AB的中点,即AC=BC=\frac{1}{2}AB,在Rt△AOC中,OA=5cm,OC=3cm,根据勾股定理得:AC=√{OA²-OC²}=4cm,则AB=2AC=8cm．故选:B．
comment: 此题考查了切线的性质,勾股定理,以及垂径定理,熟练掌握切线的性质是解本题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in two concentric circles with O as the center, the chord AB of the great circle is tangent to the small circle at point C. If the radius of the great circle is N_0 and the radius of the small circle is N_1, then the length of the chord AB is ()
